content.text:
# Cynthia Arrieu-King

Cynthia Arrieu-King is an American poet with Chinese heritage.
Early life
Cynthia Arrieu-King was raised in Louisville, Kentucky.
Career
Cynthia Arrieu-King is the author of four collections of poetry, People are Tiny in Paintings of China (2010); Manifest (2013); Futureless Languages (2018) and Continuity (2021). She also co-wrote a chapbook with Ariana-Sophia Kartsonis By a Year Lousy with Meteors (2012) and a book-length collaborative volume of poetry with the late Hillary Gravendyk, Unlikely Conditions (2016).
Arrieu-King edited the anthology-length Asian Anglophone issue of dusie.
Cynthia Arrieu-King works as a professor of creative writing at Stockton University. Through the campus radio station 91.7 WLFR, she produced the show The Last Word from 2011 to 2013, and rebooted it from 2022 to the end of 2024: Episodes can be found on Spotify.
Awards and honors
Manifest won the 2013 Gatewood Prize selected by Harryette Mullen.
Works
Poetry
* 2006 The Small Anything City (Dream Horse Press) (chapbook) ISBN not available
* 2010 People are Tiny in Paintings of China (Octopus Books)
* 2013 Manifest (Switchback Books)
* 2018 Futureless Languages (Radiator Press)
*2021 Continuity (Octopus Books) ISBN 978-1733455114
Collaborations
* 2016 By Some Miracle a Year Lousy with Meteors with Ariana-Sophia Kartsonis (Dream Horse Press)
* 2017 Unlikely Conditions with Hillary Gravendyk (1913 Press)
Poems
* "Everybody Believes They are the Good Guy," in Poetry Magazine
* "Something Beyond Interpretation, Lobster, and empire," in Bomb Magazine
* "Saga," American Poetry Review
Creative non-fiction
* The Betweens (Noemi Press) ISBN 978-1934819951
Short fiction
* "Boxes," in The Collagist
* "Franny," in Joyland Magazine
* "Roads Impassable," in StorySouth
References
External links
* [https://www.poetryfoundation.org/poetrymagazine/poems/144810/everybody-believes-they-are-the-good-guy Everybody Believes They Are the Good Guy by Cynthia Arrieu-King]
* [https://www.triquarterly.org/contributors/cynthia-arrieu-king Cynthia Arrieu-King]
* [https://bombmagazine.org/articles/cynthia-arrieu-king/ Three Poems by Cynthia Arrieu-King - BOMB Magazine]
* [http://thecollagist.com/the-collagist/2015/4/3/boxes.html Boxes - The Collagist - The Collagist]
* [http://joylandmagazine.com/regions/south/franny Franny]
* [http://www.storysouth.com/2017/03/roads-impassable.html]
